channel.title: On the Web on Herbert Mühlburger
channel.description: Recent content in On the Web on Herbert Mühlburger

item.title: [video] – Trouble with the Twittersphere
item.description: Just found a nice video about twitter and it’s users called the Twittersphere. [youtube PN2HAroA12w] (via blogdrauf.de) Related articles by Zemanta

item.title: SuggestRSS – Great Service to suggest interesting feeds
item.description: SuggestRSS is a service suggesting feeds based on your actual feeds. Just upload a OPML export of your current subscribed feeds and you are going to get nice new suggestions. I tried it out and think it is very useful. (via ReadWriteWeb) Related articles by Zemanta
